# visualizationMode

**Instance Property**

The part of the rendering process to display as the entity’s surface texture.

## Declaration

```swift
var visualizationMode: ModelDebugOptionsComponent.VisualizationMode { get }
```

## Setting the visualization mode

- **ModelDebugOptionsComponent.VisualizationMode**: A mode that specifies the portion of the rendering process to isolate and display for debugging.

items.description: A mode that specifies the portion of the rendering process to isolate and display for debugging.
